argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | numclwwlk.c | |- C = ( n e. NN0 |-> ( ( V ClWWalksN E ) ` n ) ) |
| 2 |  | numclwwlk.f | |- F = ( v e. V , n e. NN0 |-> { w e. ( C ` n ) | ( w ` 0 ) = v } ) |
| 3 |  | numclwwlk.g | |- G = ( v e. V , n e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) |-> { w e. ( C ` n ) | ( ( w ` 0 ) = v /\ ( w ` ( n - 2 ) ) = ( w ` 0 ) ) } ) |
| 4 |  | numclwwlk.q | |- Q = ( v e. V , n e. NN0 |-> { w e. ( ( V WWalksN E ) ` n ) | ( ( w ` 0 ) = v /\ ( lastS ` w ) =/= v ) } ) |
| 5 |  | numclwwlk.h | |- H = ( v e. V , n e. NN0 |-> { w e. ( C ` n ) | ( ( w ` 0 ) = v /\ ( w ` ( n - 2 ) ) =/= ( w ` 0 ) ) } ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eluzelcn | |- ( N e. ( ZZ>= ` 3 ) -> N e. CC ) |
| 7 |  | #P_2cnd | |- ( N e. ( ZZ>= ` 3 ) -> 2 e. CC ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_npcand | |- ( N e. ( ZZ>= ` 3 ) -> ( ( N - 2 ) + 2 ) = N ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_eqcomd | |- ( N e. ( ZZ>= ` 3 ) -> N = ( ( N - 2 ) + 2 ) ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_3ad2ant3 | |- ( ( V e. Fin /\ X e. V /\ N e. ( ZZ>= ` 3 ) ) -> N = ( ( N - 2 ) + 2 ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( ( <. V , E >. RegUSGrph K /\ V FriendGrph E ) /\ ( V e. Fin /\ X e. V /\ N e. ( ZZ>= ` 3 ) ) ) -> N = ( ( N - 2 ) + 2 ) ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( ( ( <. V , E >. RegUSGrph K /\ V FriendGrph E ) /\ ( V e. Fin /\ X e. V /\ N e. ( ZZ>= ` 3 ) ) ) -> ( X H N ) = ( X H ( ( N - 2 ) + 2 ) ) ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ( ( <. V , E >. RegUSGrph K /\ V FriendGrph E ) /\ ( V e. Fin /\ X e. V /\ N e. ( ZZ>= ` 3 ) ) ) -> ( # ` ( X H N ) ) = ( # ` ( X H ( ( N - 2 ) + 2 ) ) ) ) |
| 14 |  | #P_simplr | |- ( ( ( <. V , E >. RegUSGrph K /\ V FriendGrph E ) /\ ( V e. Fin /\ X e. V /\ N e. ( ZZ>= ` 3 ) ) ) -> V FriendGrph E ) |
| 15 |  | #P_simp2 | |- ( ( V e. Fin /\ X e. V /\ N e. ( ZZ>= ` 3 ) ) -> X e. V ) |
| 16 | 15 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( ( <. V , E >. RegUSGrph K /\ V FriendGrph E ) /\ ( V e. Fin /\ X e. V /\ N e. ( ZZ>= ` 3 ) ) ) -> X e. V ) |
| 17 |  | #P_uz3m2nn | |- ( N e. ( ZZ>= ` 3 ) -> ( N - 2 ) e. NN ) |
| 18 | 17 | #P_3ad2ant3 | |- ( ( V e. Fin /\ X e. V /\ N e. ( ZZ>= ` 3 ) ) -> ( N - 2 ) e. NN ) |
| 19 | 18 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( ( <. V , E >. RegUSGrph K /\ V FriendGrph E ) /\ ( V e. Fin /\ X e. V /\ N e. ( ZZ>= ` 3 ) ) ) -> ( N - 2 ) e. NN ) |
| 20 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 | #P_numclwwlk2lem3 | |- ( ( V FriendGrph E /\ X e. V /\ ( N - 2 ) e. NN ) -> ( # ` ( X Q ( N - 2 ) ) ) = ( # ` ( X H ( ( N - 2 ) + 2 ) ) ) ) |
| 21 | 14, 16, 19, 20 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( ( <. V , E >. RegUSGrph K /\ V FriendGrph E ) /\ ( V e. Fin /\ X e. V /\ N e. ( ZZ>= ` 3 ) ) ) -> ( # ` ( X Q ( N - 2 ) ) ) = ( # ` ( X H ( ( N - 2 ) + 2 ) ) ) ) |
| 22 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( <. V , E >. RegUSGrph K /\ V FriendGrph E ) -> <. V , E >. RegUSGrph K ) |
| 23 |  | #P_simp1 | |- ( ( V e. Fin /\ X e. V /\ N e. ( ZZ>= ` 3 ) ) -> V e. Fin ) |
| 24 | 22, 23 | #P_anim12i | |- ( ( ( <. V , E >. RegUSGrph K /\ V FriendGrph E ) /\ ( V e. Fin /\ X e. V /\ N e. ( ZZ>= ` 3 ) ) ) -> ( <. V , E >. RegUSGrph K /\ V e. Fin ) ) |
| 25 | 15, 18 | #P_jca | |- ( ( V e. Fin /\ X e. V /\ N e. ( ZZ>= ` 3 ) ) -> ( X e. V /\ ( N - 2 ) e. NN ) ) |
| 26 | 25 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( ( <. V , E >. RegUSGrph K /\ V FriendGrph E ) /\ ( V e. Fin /\ X e. V /\ N e. ( ZZ>= ` 3 ) ) ) -> ( X e. V /\ ( N - 2 ) e. NN ) ) |
| 27 | 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_numclwwlkqhash | |- ( ( ( <. V , E >. RegUSGrph K /\ V e. Fin ) /\ ( X e. V /\ ( N - 2 ) e. NN ) ) -> ( # ` ( X Q ( N - 2 ) ) ) = ( ( K ^ ( N - 2 ) ) - ( # ` ( X F ( N - 2 ) ) ) ) ) |
| 28 | 24, 26, 27 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ( ( <. V , E >. RegUSGrph K /\ V FriendGrph E ) /\ ( V e. Fin /\ X e. V /\ N e. ( ZZ>= ` 3 ) ) ) -> ( # ` ( X Q ( N - 2 ) ) ) = ( ( K ^ ( N - 2 ) ) - ( # ` ( X F ( N - 2 ) ) ) ) ) |
| 29 | 13, 21, 28 | #P_3eqtr2d | |- ( ( ( <. V , E >. RegUSGrph K /\ V FriendGrph E ) /\ ( V e. Fin /\ X e. V /\ N e. ( ZZ>= ` 3 ) ) ) -> ( # ` ( X H N ) ) = ( ( K ^ ( N - 2 ) ) - ( # ` ( X F ( N - 2 ) ) ) ) ) |
